page.title: 10A family working in Industry
page.content: When they closed down the steelworks ,I tried to get a job using the skills that I had there. I tried to get a job in a local hydraulics firm but there were so many for interview that I was unsuccessful. After five years of being unemployed I decided to move out of the area. I got a job working for a building firm in Newcastle, twelve miles away and had to travel there each day. That job only lasted a few months. Luckily my wife has opened a shop of her own selling knitting wool. As business seems to be doing well she now employs two more women. My daughter works in a local factory as a machinist.{There seems to {be more work for the women! My son wanted to be a miner like his grandad but{all the local mines {have been closed.
